instructions.name: i32
instructions.doc_text: put one 32 bit integer on stack

instructions.name: dec
instructions.doc_text: decrement top of the stack in place

instructions.name: eq?
instructions.doc_text: test if two 32 bit integers, producing 0/1 value

instructions.name: ez?
instructions.doc_text: test if top of stack is zero, producing 0/1 value

instructions.name: jez
instructions.doc_text: jump to address if 0 is popped from the stack

instructions.name: jnz
instructions.doc_text: jump to address if not 0 is popped from the stack
